name: CardCombat
description:
Defend yourself from a hoard of enemies!

Use your card abilities to destroy your enemies

How to play:

On your turn you can do two things, move then attack

During the movement phase, pick a selectable tile to move to it.

During the attack phase, play cards to perform various attacks.

Attack enemies to destroy them.

How to win?

Destroy all of your enemies before they destroy you!

Known Bugs!

This was made in 48 Hours (by a single person) for the 2022 GMTK GameJam, there are more than a few bugs! Below are listed some known ones, try to avoid them to be able to play!

  • Don't switch between full screen and windowed during gameplay, the cards will misalign and you wont be able play them!
